subject: A Behind The Scenes Look at Campaign 2008
body:
This email is sent in compliance with strict anti-abuse and NO SPAM 
regulations. This is Absolutely not SPAM.
This message is sent in full compliance of the new U.S. Federal e-mail bill 
S.1618 Title III, Section 301, Paragraph (a)(2)(C).
This message was sent to our opt-in subscriber list and cannot be 
considered SPAM as long as it includes:
1) contact information, and 2) a way to be removed from future e-mailings. 
If this e-mail has reached you in error, or should you wish to be 
permanently removed from our opt-in, subscriber mailing list, please 
click here
. 
Opt-In Web Services, Casa 24, Urb. Villa Vista, Torremolinos, 29620, 
Spain.
